channel.title: Gennaro Calendo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Gennaro Calendo's Blog

item.title: Create Krona Plot from Qiime2 Artifacts
item.description: Krona is a wonderful tool for interactively visualizing metagenomic samples. If you are using Qiime2 however, shaping your data into a format that can be used by Krona is not entirely straight-forward. Below, I hope to explain my workflow for creating Krona charts derived from a Qiime2 workflow. I will use the example files from the Qiime2 Moving Pictures Tutorial to show how a krona chart can be constructed from these QIIME2 artifacts.

item.title: About
item.description: About I am a recent graduate of a Masterâ€™s program in bioinformatics and general biological data science enthusiast. Currently, I am working as an Associate Bioinformatics Scientist at the Corriell Institute for Medical Research. I plan on using this blog to document my learning experience as I continue to grow and learn new things about bioinformatics and programming.
